entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
